name: A Mix Of Trivial Trivia Online Quiz | General | 10 Questions

questions.text: In the United States, what is stolen every 90 seconds?
Which Movie was the first ape movie to have a sequel?
What activity caused 16,000 Americans to be injured during 1999?
Which company was launched by two teenagers in 1907?
What do 1 in 4 people say they do before going to bed each night?
options: Set the alarm clock back so they get more sleep

questions.text: What do 59 percent of people say that if they had their way what would be the first thing they would have in the morning?
options: An illness so they could get out of work

questions.text: What do men make 85 percent of?
Which movie was the first one to sell over $100 million in ticket for a weekend?
Which U.S. City has the most psychiatrists per capita?
questions.explanation:
Washington, D.C.

	I guess those politician need the help.

questions.text: What will you get an average of 8 of each year?
questions.explanation:
Birthday Cards.

	If you answered stuck in traffic, please let me know where so I can move.
